sup_iterate_eq_nfp:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ^[ ]» -/
@[simp]
theorem sup_iterate_eq_nfp (f : ordinal.{u} → ordinal.{u}) : (fun a => sup fun n : ℕ => («expr ^[ ]» f n) a) = nfp f :=
  by
  refine' funext fun a => le_antisymm _ (sup_le fun l => _)
  · rw [sup_le_iff]
    intro n
    rw [← list.length_replicate n Unit.unit, ← list.foldr_const f a]
    apply le_sup
  · rw [list.foldr_const f a l]
    exact le_sup _ _
#align sup_iterate_eq_nfp sup_iterate_eq_nfp
nfp_zero_mul:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ^[ ]» -/
@[simp]
theorem nfp_zero_mul : nfp ((· * ·) 0) = id := by
  rw [← sup_iterate_eq_nfp]
  refine' funext fun a => (sup_le fun n => _).antisymm (le_sup (fun n => («expr ^[ ]» ((· * ·) 0) n) a) 0)
  induction' n with n hn; · rfl
  rw [function.iterate_succ']
  change 0 * _ ≤ a
  rw [zero_mul]
  exact ordinal.zero_le a
#align nfp_zero_mul nfp_zero_mul
nfp_mul_zero:
@[simp]
theorem nfp_mul_zero (a : ordinal) : nfp ((· * ·) a) 0 = 0 :=
  by
  rw [← ordinal.le_zero, nfp_le_iff]
  intro n
  induction' n with n hn; · rfl
  rwa [iterate_succ_apply, mul_zero]
#align nfp_mul_zero nfp_mul_zero
nfp_mul_opow_omega_add:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `ordinal.pow -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `ordinal.pow -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `ordinal.pow -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `ordinal.pow -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `ordinal.pow -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `ordinal.pow -/
theorem nfp_mul_opow_omega_add {a c : ordinal} (b) (ha : 0 < a) (hc : 0 < c) (hca : c ≤ ordinal.pow a omega) :
    nfp ((· * ·) a) (ordinal.pow a omega * b + c) = ordinal.pow a omega.{u} * succ b :=
  by
  apply le_antisymm
  · apply nfp_le_fp (mul_is_normal ha).monotone
    · rw [mul_succ]
      apply add_le_add_left hca
    · rw [← mul_assoc, ← opow_one_add, one_add_omega]
  · cases' mul_eq_right_iff_opow_omega_dvd.1 ((mul_is_normal ha).nfp_fp (ordinal.pow a omega * b + c)) with d hd
    rw [hd]
    apply mul_le_mul_left'
    have := le_nfp (has_mul.mul a) (ordinal.pow a omega * b + c)
    rw [hd] at this
    have := (add_lt_add_left hc (ordinal.pow a omega * b)).trans_le this
    rw [add_zero, mul_lt_mul_iff_left (opow_pos omega ha)] at this
    rwa [succ_le_iff]
#align nfp_mul_opow_omega_add nfp_mul_opow_omega_add
nfp_mul_one:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `ordinal.pow -/
@[simp]
theorem nfp_mul_one {a : ordinal} (ha : 0 < a) : nfp ((· * ·) a) 1 = ordinal.pow a omega :=
  by
  rw [← sup_iterate_eq_nfp, ← sup_opow_nat]
  · dsimp
    congr
    funext
    induction' n with n hn
    · rw [Nat.cast_zero, opow_zero, iterate_zero_apply]
    nth_rw 2 [Nat.succ_eq_one_add]
    rw [Nat.cast_add, Nat.cast_one, opow_add, opow_one, iterate_succ_apply', hn]
  · exact ha
#align nfp_mul_one nfp_mul_one
nfp_mul_eq_opow_omega:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `ordinal.pow -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `ordinal.pow -/
theorem nfp_mul_eq_opow_omega {a b : ordinal} (hb : 0 < b) (hba : b ≤ ordinal.pow a omega) :
    nfp ((· * ·) a) b = ordinal.pow a omega.{u} :=
  by
  cases' eq_zero_or_pos a with ha ha
  · rw [ha, zero_opow omega_ne_zero] at *
    rw [ordinal.le_zero.1 hba, nfp_zero_mul]
    rfl
  apply le_antisymm
  · apply nfp_le_fp (mul_is_normal ha).monotone hba
    rw [← opow_one_add, one_add_omega]
  rw [← nfp_mul_one ha]
  exact nfp_monotone (mul_is_normal ha).monotone (one_le_iff_pos.2 hb)
#align nfp_mul_eq_opow_omega nfp_mul_eq_opow_omega
nfp_monotone:
theorem nfp_monotone (hf : monotone f) : monotone (nfp f) :=
  nfp_family_monotone fun i => hf
#align nfp_monotone nfp_monotone

theorem nfp_le_iff {a b} : nfp f a ≤ b ↔ ∀ n, («expr ^[ ]» f n) a ≤ b :=

nfp_le_fp:
theorem nfp_le_fp {f} (H : monotone f) {a b} (ab : a ≤ b) (h : f b ≤ b) : nfp f a ≤ b :=
  nfp_family_le_fp (fun _ => H) ab fun _ => h
#align nfp_le_fp nfp_le_fp
nfp_le_apply:
theorem is_normal.nfp_le_apply {f} (H : is_normal f) {a b} : nfp f a ≤ f b ↔ nfp f a ≤ b :=
  le_iff_le_iff_lt_iff_lt.2 H.apply_lt_nfp

nfp_id:
@[simp]
theorem nfp_id : nfp id = id :=
  funext fun a => by
    simp_rw [← sup_iterate_eq_nfp, iterate_id]
    exact sup_const a
#align nfp_id nfp_id
nfp_family_monotone:
theorem nfp_family_monotone (hf : ∀ i, monotone (f i)) : monotone (nfp_family f) := fun a b h =>
  sup_le fun l => (list.foldr_monotone hf l h).trans (le_sup _ l)
#align nfp_family_monotone nfp_family_monotone
nfp_family_le_iff:
theorem nfp_family_le_iff {a b} : nfp_family f a ≤ b ↔ ∀ l, list.foldr f a l ≤ b :=
  sup_le_iff
#align nfp_family_le_iff nfp_family_le_iff
nfp_family_le_fp:
theorem nfp_family_le_fp (H : ∀ i, monotone (f i)) {a b} (ab : a ≤ b) (h : ∀ i, f i b ≤ b) : nfp_family f a ≤ b :=
  sup_le fun l => by
    by_cases hι : is_empty ι
    · skip
      rwa [unique.eq_default l]
    · haveI := not_isEmpty_iff.1 hι
      induction' l with i l IH generalizing a
      · exact ab
      exact (H i (IH ab)).trans (h i)
#align nfp_family_le_fp nfp_family_le_fp
nfp_family_le_apply:
theorem nfp_family_le_apply [nonempty ι] (H : ∀ i, is_normal (f i)) {a b} :
    (∃ i, nfp_family f a ≤ f i b) ↔ nfp_family f a ≤ b :=
  by
  rw [← not_iff_not]
  push_neg
  exact apply_lt_nfp_family_iff H
#align nfp_family_le_apply nfp_family_le_apply
nfp_family_le:

nfp_family_fp:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:177:8: unsupported: ambiguous notation -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `sym.cons' -/
theorem nfp_family_fp {i} (H : is_normal (f i)) (a) : f i (nfp_family f a) = nfp_family f a :=
  by
  unfold nfp_family
  rw [@is_normal.sup _ H _ _ ⟨[]⟩]
  apply le_antisymm <;> refine' ordinal.sup_le fun l => _
  · exact le_sup _ (sym.cons' i l)
  · exact (H.self_le _).trans (le_sup _ _)
#align nfp_family_fp nfp_family_fp

theorem nfp_family_eq_self {f : ι → ordinal → ordinal} {a} (h : ∀ i, f i a = a) : nfp_family f a = a :=
  le_antisymm (sup_le fun l => by rw [List.foldr_fixed' h l]) (le_nfp_family f a)

nfp_eq_self:
theorem nfp_eq_self {f : ordinal → ordinal} {a} (h : f a = a) : nfp f a = a :=
  nfp_family_eq_self fun _ => h
#align nfp_eq_self nfp_eq_self

nfp_bfamily_le_fp:

    nfp_bfamily o f a ≤ b :=

#align nfp_bfamily_le_fp nfp_bfamily_le_fp
nfp_bfamily_le_apply:
theorem nfp_bfamily_le_apply (ho : o ≠ 0) (H : ∀ i hi, is_normal (f i hi)) {a b} :
    (∃ i hi, nfp_bfamily o f a ≤ f i hi b) ↔ nfp_bfamily o f a ≤ b :=

nfp_bfamily_le:

nfp_bfamily_fp:

nfp_add_zero:
@[simp]
theorem nfp_add_zero (a) : nfp ((· + ·) a) 0 = a * omega :=
  by
  simp_rw [← sup_iterate_eq_nfp, ← sup_mul_nat]
  congr ; funext
  induction' n with n hn
  · rw [Nat.cast_zero, mul_zero, iterate_zero_apply]
  · nth_rw 2 [Nat.succ_eq_one_add]

nfp_add_eq_mul_omega:
theorem nfp_add_eq_mul_omega {a b} (hba : b ≤ a * omega) : nfp ((· + ·) a) b = a * omega :=
  by
  apply le_antisymm (nfp_le_fp (add_is_normal a).monotone hba _)
  · rw [← nfp_add_zero]
    exact nfp_monotone (add_is_normal a).monotone (ordinal.zero_le b)
  · rw [← mul_one_add, one_add_omega]

mul_le_right_iff_opow_omega_dvd:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `ordinal.pow -/
theorem mul_le_right_iff_opow_omega_dvd {a b : ordinal} (ha : 0 < a) : a * b ≤ b ↔ ordinal.pow a omega ∣ b :=
  by
  rw [← mul_eq_right_iff_opow_omega_dvd]
  exact (mul_is_normal ha).le_iff_eq
#align mul_le_right_iff_opow_omega_dvd mul_le_right_iff_opow_omega_dvd
mul_eq_right_iff_opow_omega_dvd:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `ordinal.pow -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `ordinal.pow -/
theorem mul_eq_right_iff_opow_omega_dvd {a b : ordinal} : a * b = b ↔ ordinal.pow a omega ∣ b :=
  by
  cases' eq_zero_or_pos a with ha ha
  · rw [ha, zero_mul, zero_opow omega_ne_zero, zero_dvd_iff]
    exact eq_comm
  refine' ⟨fun hab => _, fun h => _⟩
  · rw [dvd_iff_mod_eq_zero]
    rw [← div_add_mod b (ordinal.pow a omega), mul_add, ← mul_assoc, ← opow_one_add, one_add_omega, add_left_cancel] at
      hab
    cases' eq_zero_or_opow_omega_le_of_mul_eq_right hab with hab hab
    · exact hab
    refine' (not_lt_of_le hab (mod_lt b (opow_ne_zero omega _))).elim
    rwa [← ordinal.pos_iff_ne_zero]
  cases' h with c hc
  rw [hc, ← mul_assoc, ← opow_one_add, one_add_omega]
#align mul_eq_right_iff_opow_omega_dvd mul_eq_right_iff_opow_omega_dvd

le_nfp_family:
theorem le_nfp_family (f : ι → ordinal → ordinal) (a) : a ≤ nfp_family f a :=
  le_sup _ []
#align le_nfp_family le_nfp_family
le_nfp_bfamily:
theorem le_nfp_bfamily {o : ordinal} (f : ∀ b < o, ordinal → ordinal) (a) : a ≤ nfp_bfamily o f a :=
  le_sup _ []
#align le_nfp_bfamily le_nfp_bfamily
le_nfp:
theorem le_nfp (f a) : a ≤ nfp f a :=
  iterate_le_nfp f a 0
#align le_nfp le_nfp
le_iff_deriv_family:
theorem le_iff_deriv_family (H : ∀ i, is_normal (f i)) {a} : (∀ i, f i a ≤ a) ↔ ∃ o, deriv_family f o = a :=
  ⟨fun ha => by
    suffices : ∀ (o) (_ : a ≤ deriv_family f o), ∃ o, deriv_family f o = a
    exact this a ((deriv_family_is_normal _).self_le _)
    refine' fun o => limit_rec_on o (fun h₁ => ⟨0, le_antisymm _ h₁⟩) (fun o IH h₁ => _) fun o l IH h₁ => _
    · rw [deriv_family_zero]
      exact nfp_family_le_fp (fun i => (H i).monotone) (ordinal.zero_le _) ha
    · cases le_or_lt a (deriv_family f o)
      · exact IH h
      refine' ⟨succ o, le_antisymm _ h₁⟩
      rw [deriv_family_succ]
      exact nfp_family_le_fp (fun i => (H i).monotone) (succ_le_of_lt h) ha
    · cases eq_or_lt_of_le h₁
      · exact ⟨_, h.symm⟩
      rw [deriv_family_limit _ l, ← not_le, bsup_le_iff, not_ball] at h
      exact
        let ⟨o', h, hl⟩ := h
        IH o' h (le_of_not_le hl),
    fun ⟨o, e⟩ i => e ▸ le_of_eq (deriv_family_fp (H i) _)⟩
#align le_iff_deriv_family le_iff_deriv_family
le_iff_deriv_bfamily:
theorem le_iff_deriv_bfamily (H : ∀ i hi, is_normal (f i hi)) {a} :
    (∀ i hi, f i hi a ≤ a) ↔ ∃ b, deriv_bfamily o f b = a :=
  by
  unfold deriv_bfamily
  rw [← le_iff_deriv_family]
  · refine' ⟨fun h i => h _ _, fun h i hi => _⟩
    rw [← family_of_bfamily_enum o f]
    apply h
  exact fun _ => H _ _
#align le_iff_deriv_bfamily le_iff_deriv_bfamily
le_iff_deriv:
theorem is_normal.le_iff_deriv {f} (H : is_normal f) {a} : f a ≤ a ↔ ∃ o, deriv f o = a :=
  by
  unfold deriv
  rw [← le_iff_deriv_family fun _ : unit => H]
  exact ⟨fun h _ => h, fun h => h Unit.unit⟩
#align is_normal.le_iff_deriv is_normal.le_iff_deriv
iterate_le_nfp:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ^[ ]» -/
theorem iterate_le_nfp (f a n) : («expr ^[ ]» f n) a ≤ nfp f a :=
  by
  rw [← sup_iterate_eq_nfp]
  exact le_sup _ n
#align iterate_le_nfp iterate_le_nfp
fp_unbounded:
/-- The fixed point lemma for normal functions: any normal function has an unbounded set of
fixed points. -/
theorem fp_unbounded (H : is_normal f) : (Function.fixedPoints f).unbounded (· < ·) :=
  by
  convert fp_family_unbounded fun _ : unit => H
  exact (Set.interᵢ_const _).symm
#align fp_unbounded fp_unbounded
fp_iff_deriv_family:
theorem fp_iff_deriv_family (H : ∀ i, is_normal (f i)) {a} : (∀ i, f i a = a) ↔ ∃ o, deriv_family f o = a :=
  iff.trans ⟨fun h i => le_of_eq (h i), fun h i => (H i).le_iff_eq.1 (h i)⟩ (le_iff_deriv_family H)
#align fp_iff_deriv_family fp_iff_deriv_family
fp_iff_deriv_bfamily:
theorem fp_iff_deriv_bfamily (H : ∀ i hi, is_normal (f i hi)) {a} :
    (∀ i hi, f i hi a = a) ↔ ∃ b, deriv_bfamily o f b = a :=
  by
  rw [← le_iff_deriv_bfamily H]
  refine' ⟨fun h i hi => le_of_eq (h i hi), fun h i hi => _⟩
  rw [← (H i hi).le_iff_eq]
  exact h i hi
#align fp_iff_deriv_bfamily fp_iff_deriv_bfamily
fp_iff_deriv:
theorem is_normal.fp_iff_deriv {f} (H : is_normal f) {a} : f a = a ↔ ∃ o, deriv f o = a := by
  rw [← H.le_iff_eq, H.le_iff_deriv]
#align is_normal.fp_iff_deriv is_normal.fp_iff_deriv
fp_family_unbounded:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr⋂ , » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `«expr⋂ , » -/
/-- A generalization of the fixed point lemma for normal functions: any family of normal functions
    has an unbounded set of common fixed points. -/
theorem fp_family_unbounded (H : ∀ i, is_normal (f i)) :
    («expr⋂ , » "./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `«expr⋂ , »"
          (Function.fixedPoints (f i))).unbounded
      (· < ·) :=
  fun a =>
  ⟨_, fun s ⟨i, hi⟩ => by
    rw [← hi]
    exact nfp_family_fp (H i) a, (le_nfp_family f a).not_lt⟩
#align fp_family_unbounded fp_family_unbounded
fp_bfamily_unbounded:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr⋂ , » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `«expr⋂ , » -/
/-- A generalization of the fixed point lemma for normal functions: any family of normal functions
    has an unbounded set of common fixed points. -/
theorem fp_bfamily_unbounded (H : ∀ i hi, is_normal (f i hi)) :
    («expr⋂ , » "./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `«expr⋂ , »"
          (Function.fixedPoints (f i hi))).unbounded
      (· < ·) :=
  fun a =>
  ⟨_, by
    rw [Set.mem_interᵢ₂]
    exact fun i hi => nfp_bfamily_fp (H i hi) _, (le_nfp_bfamily f a).not_lt⟩
#align fp_bfamily_unbounded fp_bfamily_unbounded
foldr_le_nfp_family:
theorem foldr_le_nfp_family (f : ι → ordinal → ordinal) (a l) : list.foldr f a l ≤ nfp_family f a :=
  le_sup _ _
#align foldr_le_nfp_family foldr_le_nfp_family
foldr_le_nfp_bfamily:
theorem foldr_le_nfp_bfamily {o : ordinal} (f : ∀ b < o, ordinal → ordinal) (a l) :
    list.foldr (family_of_bfamily o f) a l ≤ nfp_bfamily o f a :=
  le_sup _ _
#align foldr_le_nfp_bfamily foldr_le_nfp_bfamily
eq_zero_or_opow_omega_le_of_mul_eq_right:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `ordinal.pow -/
theorem eq_zero_or_opow_omega_le_of_mul_eq_right {a b : ordinal} (hab : a * b = b) :
    b = 0 ∨ ordinal.pow a omega.{u} ≤ b :=
  by
  cases' eq_zero_or_pos a with ha ha
  · rw [ha, zero_opow omega_ne_zero]
    exact or.inr (ordinal.zero_le b)
  rw [or_iff_not_imp_left]
  intro hb
  change b ≠ 0 at hb
  rw [← nfp_mul_one ha]
  rw [← one_le_iff_ne_zero] at hb
  exact nfp_le_fp (mul_is_normal ha).monotone hb (le_of_eq hab)
#align eq_zero_or_opow_omega_le_of_mul_eq_right eq_zero_or_opow_omega_le_of_mul_eq_right
deriv_zero:
@[simp]
theorem deriv_zero (f) : deriv f 0 = nfp f 0 :=
  deriv_family_zero _
#align deriv_zero deriv_zero
deriv_succ:
@[simp]
theorem deriv_succ (f o) : deriv f (succ o) = nfp f (succ (deriv f o)) :=
  deriv_family_succ _ _
#align deriv_succ deriv_succ
deriv_mul_zero:
@[simp]
theorem deriv_mul_zero : deriv ((· * ·) 0) = id :=
  deriv_eq_id_of_nfp_eq_id nfp_zero_mul
#align deriv_mul_zero deriv_mul_zero
deriv_mul_eq_opow_omega_mul:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `ordinal.pow -/
theorem deriv_mul_eq_opow_omega_mul {a : ordinal.{u}} (ha : 0 < a) (b) :
    deriv ((· * ·) a) b = ordinal.pow a omega * b := by
  revert b
  rw [← funext_iff, is_normal.eq_iff_zero_and_succ (deriv_is_normal _) (mul_is_normal (opow_pos omega ha))]
  refine' ⟨_, fun c h => _⟩
  · rw [deriv_zero, nfp_mul_zero, mul_zero]
  · rw [deriv_succ, h]
    exact nfp_mul_opow_omega_add c ha zero_lt_one (one_le_iff_pos.2 (opow_pos _ ha))
#align deriv_mul_eq_opow_omega_mul deriv_mul_eq_opow_omega_mul
deriv_limit:
theorem deriv_limit (f) {o} : is_limit o → deriv f o = bsup.{u, 0} o fun a _ => deriv f a :=
  deriv_family_limit _
#align deriv_limit deriv_limit
deriv_is_normal:
theorem deriv_is_normal (f) : is_normal (deriv f) :=
  deriv_family_is_normal _
#align deriv_is_normal deriv_is_normal
deriv_id_of_nfp_id:
theorem deriv_id_of_nfp_id {f : ordinal → ordinal} (h : nfp f = id) : deriv f = id :=
  ((deriv_is_normal _).eq_iff_zero_and_succ is_normal.refl).2 (by simp [h])
#align deriv_id_of_nfp_id deriv_id_of_nfp_id
deriv_family_zero:
@[simp]
theorem deriv_family_zero (f : ι → ordinal → ordinal) : deriv_family f 0 = nfp_family f 0 :=
  limit_rec_on_zero _ _ _
#align deriv_family_zero deriv_family_zero
deriv_family_succ:
@[simp]
theorem deriv_family_succ (f : ι → ordinal → ordinal) (o) :
    deriv_family f (succ o) = nfp_family f (succ (deriv_family f o)) :=
  limit_rec_on_succ _ _ _ _
#align deriv_family_succ deriv_family_succ
deriv_family_limit:
theorem deriv_family_limit (f : ι → ordinal → ordinal) {o} :
    is_limit o → deriv_family f o = bsup.{max u v, u} o fun a _ => deriv_family f a :=
  limit_rec_on_limit _ _ _ _
#align deriv_family_limit deriv_family_limit
deriv_family_is_normal:
theorem deriv_family_is_normal (f : ι → ordinal → ordinal) : is_normal (deriv_family f) :=
  ⟨fun o => by rw [deriv_family_succ, ← succ_le_iff] <;> apply le_nfp_family, fun o l a => by
    rw [deriv_family_limit _ l, bsup_le_iff]⟩
#align deriv_family_is_normal deriv_family_is_normal
deriv_family_fp:
theorem deriv_family_fp {i} (H : is_normal (f i)) (o : ordinal.{max u v}) : f i (deriv_family f o) = deriv_family f o :=
  by
  refine' limit_rec_on o _ (fun o IH => _) _
  · rw [deriv_family_zero]
    exact nfp_family_fp H 0
  · rw [deriv_family_succ]
    exact nfp_family_fp H _
  · intro o l IH
    rw [deriv_family_limit _ l, is_normal.bsup.{max u v, u, max u v} H (fun a _ => deriv_family f a) l.1]
    refine' eq_of_forall_ge_iff fun c => _
    simp (config := { contextual := true }) only [bsup_le_iff, IH]
#align deriv_family_fp deriv_family_fp
deriv_family_eq_enum_ord:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr⋂ , » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `«expr⋂ , » -/
theorem deriv_family_eq_enum_ord (H : ∀ i, is_normal (f i)) :
    deriv_family f =
      enum_ord
        («expr⋂ , » "./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `«expr⋂ , »"
          (Function.fixedPoints (f i))) :=
  by
  rw [← eq_enum_ord _ (fp_family_unbounded H)]
  use (deriv_family_is_normal f).strict_mono
  rw [Set.range_eq_iff]
  refine' ⟨_, fun a ha => _⟩
  · rintro a S ⟨i, hi⟩
    rw [← hi]
    exact deriv_family_fp (H i) a
  rw [Set.mem_interᵢ] at ha
  rwa [← fp_iff_deriv_family H]
#align deriv_family_eq_enum_ord deriv_family_eq_enum_ord
deriv_eq_id_of_nfp_eq_id:
theorem deriv_eq_id_of_nfp_eq_id {f : ordinal → ordinal} (h : nfp f = id) : deriv f = id :=
  (is_normal.eq_iff_zero_and_succ (deriv_is_normal _) is_normal.refl).2 (by simp [h])
#align deriv_eq_id_of_nfp_eq_id deriv_eq_id_of_nfp_eq_id
deriv_eq_enum_ord:
theorem deriv_eq_enum_ord (H : is_normal f) : deriv f = enum_ord (Function.fixedPoints f) :=
  by
  convert deriv_family_eq_enum_ord fun _ : unit => H
  exact (Set.interᵢ_const _).symm
#align deriv_eq_enum_ord deriv_eq_enum_ord
deriv_eq_deriv_family:
theorem deriv_eq_deriv_family (f : ordinal → ordinal) : deriv f = deriv_family fun _ : unit => f :=
  rfl
#align deriv_eq_deriv_family deriv_eq_deriv_family
deriv_bfamily_is_normal:
theorem deriv_bfamily_is_normal {o : ordinal} (f : ∀ b < o, ordinal → ordinal) : is_normal (deriv_bfamily o f) :=
  deriv_family_is_normal _
#align deriv_bfamily_is_normal deriv_bfamily_is_normal
deriv_bfamily_fp:
theorem deriv_bfamily_fp {i hi} (H : is_normal (f i hi)) (a : ordinal) :
    f i hi (deriv_bfamily o f a) = deriv_bfamily o f a :=
  by
  rw [← family_of_bfamily_enum o f]
  apply deriv_family_fp
  rw [family_of_bfamily_enum]
  exact H
#align deriv_bfamily_fp deriv_bfamily_fp
deriv_bfamily_eq_enum_ord:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr⋂ , » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `«expr⋂ , » -/
theorem deriv_bfamily_eq_enum_ord (H : ∀ i hi, is_normal (f i hi)) :
    deriv_bfamily o f =
      enum_ord
        («expr⋂ , » "./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `«expr⋂ , »"
          (Function.fixedPoints (f i hi))) :=
  by
  rw [← eq_enum_ord _ (fp_bfamily_unbounded H)]
  use (deriv_bfamily_is_normal f).strict_mono
  rw [Set.range_eq_iff]
  refine' ⟨fun a => Set.mem_interᵢ₂.2 fun i hi => deriv_bfamily_fp (H i hi) a, fun a ha => _⟩
  rw [Set.mem_interᵢ₂] at ha
  rwa [← fp_iff_deriv_bfamily H]
#align deriv_bfamily_eq_enum_ord deriv_bfamily_eq_enum_ord
deriv_bfamily_eq_deriv_family:
theorem deriv_bfamily_eq_deriv_family {o : ordinal} (f : ∀ b < o, ordinal → ordinal) :
    deriv_bfamily o f = deriv_family (family_of_bfamily o f) :=
  rfl
#align deriv_bfamily_eq_deriv_family deriv_bfamily_eq_deriv_family
deriv_add_eq_mul_omega_add:
theorem deriv_add_eq_mul_omega_add (a b : ordinal.{u}) : deriv ((· + ·) a) b = a * omega + b :=
  by
  revert b
  rw [← funext_iff, is_normal.eq_iff_zero_and_succ (deriv_is_normal _) (add_is_normal _)]
  refine' ⟨_, fun a h => _⟩
  · rw [deriv_zero, add_zero]
    exact nfp_add_zero a
  · rw [deriv_succ, h, add_succ]
    exact nfp_eq_self (add_eq_right_iff_mul_omega_le.2 ((le_add_right _ _).trans (le_succ _)))
#align deriv_add_eq_mul_omega_add deriv_add_eq_mul_omega_add
apply_lt_nfp_family_iff:
theorem apply_lt_nfp_family_iff [nonempty ι] (H : ∀ i, is_normal (f i)) {a b} :
    (∀ i, f i b < nfp_family f a) ↔ b < nfp_family f a :=
  ⟨fun h =>
    lt_nfp_family.2 <|
      let ⟨l, hl⟩ := lt_sup.1 (h (classical.arbitrary ι))
      ⟨l, ((H _).self_le b).trans_lt hl⟩,
    apply_lt_nfp_family H⟩
#align apply_lt_nfp_family_iff apply_lt_nfp_family_iff
apply_lt_nfp_family:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:177:8: unsupported: ambiguous notation -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `sym.cons' -/
theorem apply_lt_nfp_family (H : ∀ i, is_normal (f i)) {a b} (hb : b < nfp_family f a) (i) : f i b < nfp_family f a :=
  let ⟨l, hl⟩ := lt_nfp_family.1 hb
  lt_sup.2 ⟨sym.cons' i l, (H i).strict_mono hl⟩
#align apply_lt_nfp_family apply_lt_nfp_family
apply_lt_nfp_bfamily:
theorem apply_lt_nfp_bfamily (ho : o ≠ 0) (H : ∀ i hi, is_normal (f i hi)) {a b} :
    (∀ i hi, f i hi b < nfp_bfamily o f a) ↔ b < nfp_bfamily o f a :=
  by
  unfold nfp_bfamily
  rw [← @apply_lt_nfp_family_iff _ (family_of_bfamily o f) (out_nonempty_iff_ne_zero.2 ho) fun i => H _ _]
  refine' ⟨fun h i => h _ (typein_lt_self i), fun h i hio => _⟩
  rw [← family_of_bfamily_enum o f]
  apply h
#align apply_lt_nfp_bfamily apply_lt_nfp_bfamily
apply_lt_nfp:
theorem is_normal.apply_lt_nfp {f} (H : is_normal f) {a b} : f b < nfp f a ↔ b < nfp f a :=
  by
  unfold nfp
  rw [← @apply_lt_nfp_family_iff unit (fun _ => f) _ (fun _ => H) a b]
  exact ⟨fun h _ => h, fun h => h Unit.unit⟩
#align is_normal.apply_lt_nfp is_normal.apply_lt_nfp
apply_le_nfp_family:
theorem apply_le_nfp_family [hι : nonempty ι] {f : ι → ordinal → ordinal} (H : ∀ i, is_normal (f i)) {a b} :
    (∀ i, f i b ≤ nfp_family f a) ↔ b ≤ nfp_family f a :=
  by
  refine' ⟨fun h => _, fun h i => _⟩
  · cases' hι with i
    exact ((H i).self_le b).trans (h i)
  rw [← nfp_family_fp (H i)]
  exact (H i).monotone h
#align apply_le_nfp_family apply_le_nfp_family
apply_le_nfp_bfamily:
theorem apply_le_nfp_bfamily (ho : o ≠ 0) (H : ∀ i hi, is_normal (f i hi)) {a b} :
    (∀ i hi, f i hi b ≤ nfp_bfamily o f a) ↔ b ≤ nfp_bfamily o f a :=
  by
  refine' ⟨fun h => _, fun h i hi => _⟩
  · have ho' : 0 < o := ordinal.pos_iff_ne_zero.2 ho
    exact ((H 0 ho').self_le b).trans (h 0 ho')
  rw [← nfp_bfamily_fp (H i hi)]
  exact (H i hi).monotone h
#align apply_le_nfp_bfamily apply_le_nfp_bfamily
apply_le_nfp:
theorem is_normal.apply_le_nfp {f} (H : is_normal f) {a b} : f b ≤ nfp f a ↔ b ≤ nfp f a :=
  ⟨le_trans (H.self_le _), fun h => by simpa only [H.nfp_fp] using H.le_iff.2 h⟩
#align is_normal.apply_le_nfp is_normal.apply_le_nfp
add_le_right_iff_mul_omega_le:
theorem add_le_right_iff_mul_omega_le {a b : ordinal} : a + b ≤ b ↔ a * omega ≤ b :=
  by
  rw [← add_eq_right_iff_mul_omega_le]
  exact (add_is_normal a).le_iff_eq
#align add_le_right_iff_mul_omega_le add_le_right_iff_mul_omega_le
add_eq_right_iff_mul_omega_le:
theorem add_eq_right_iff_mul_omega_le {a b : ordinal} : a + b = b ↔ a * omega ≤ b :=
  by
  refine' ⟨fun h => _, fun h => _⟩
  · rw [← nfp_add_zero a, ← deriv_zero]
    cases' (add_is_normal a).fp_iff_deriv.1 h with c hc
    rw [← hc]
    exact (deriv_is_normal _).monotone (ordinal.zero_le _)
  · have := ordinal.add_sub_cancel_of_le h
    nth_rw 1 [← this]
    rwa [← add_assoc, ← mul_one_add, one_add_omega]
#align add_eq_right_iff_mul_omega_le add_eq_right_iff_mul_omega_le
